title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 751.1 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 751.1 - Definition

State Regulations

The terms diagnostic center and treatment center, also
referred to in this Article as a center, shall mean a medical facility with one
or more organized health services not part of an inpatient hospital facility or
vocational rehabilitation center primarily engaged in providing services and
facilities to out-of-hospital or ambulatory patients by or under the
supervision of a physician or, in the case of a dental service or dispensary, of a dentist, for the prevention, diagnosis and, in the case of a treatment
center, treatment of human disease, pain, injury, deformity or physical
condition, not including the individual or group private practice of
medicine. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
751.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
